page.title: 06Street names
page.content: Today 24th May Anthony and I went to the Glebe estate, to ask people about their street. All the people we visited were very friendly. We went to Fosterd RD, Norman RD, Quarry Close. All the people we asked thought that their roads were alright, and everybody thought that where they were was very quite. When we asked about their road names some said it was unusual. At Norman RD they thought the name was alright but 1 did not care. At Quarry Close 1 person said it was appropriate because the Quarry is near to where she lives. Most people wanted improvements. At Fosterd RD they did not want any improvements, at Norman RD they wanted better kept gardens,wider roads, at Quarry Close they wanted some plants on the green.
